If you would like to send a message to multiple recipients, enter their IDs in the ID box below, separated by commas. For example, to send a message to the user with ID 2 and user with ID 3, enter (spaces are optional): 2, 3

NOTE: Customers are only allowed to view Restricted Saving accounts. Please see a teller if you would like to modify this account.
Submitstring>
Other Options
Below are list of messages. Click on a message to view! . Admins are the users that have the ability to access information about the bank and can manage the other users of the bank.\n\nThey can:\n \n\t- Create tellers and admins\n\t- View all users in the bank\n\t- View the banks total balance\n\t- Promote tellers to admins\n\t- Serialize and deserialize the database \n\nThese features can be accessed in the Admin terminal. Tellers have the ability to serve customers.\n\nIn order for the Teller to be able to have most of its functionality, it must authenticate a user in the Teller Terminal. Once a user is authenticated, then the teller is able to: \n\nThey can:\n\t- Make a deposit to an account\n\t- Make a withdrawal from an account\n\t- Check the balance of an account\n\t- List a customers accounts\n\t- View customer messages \n\nWhen there is no user authenticated, then the Teller can:\n\t- Authenticate a new user\n\t- Make a new user\n\t- Leave a message for a customer\n\t- Give interest to an account Customers are the users of the bank who store their money into an account.\n\nThey can:\n \n\t- View their accounts\n\t- Make deposits and withdrawals (except for restrcited saving accounts)\n\nIn order for a customer to create new accounts, they should request access from a Teller who can help them with this. Customer Help
